title: Drawing, 1929–32
medium: Brush and black and green goauche, silver paint, graphite on off-white wove paper
provenance: University Reseach Library, University of California, Los Angeles; Henry Dreyfuss
creditline: Gift of University of California, Los Angeles
description: Design for a triangular package with, on flat sides, geometric triangular forms alternating solid black in negative areas and lines in right angles in other areas, above; perspective view of box showing narrow band on lower left, and a square showing general design.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1929–32.
1929–32. Brush and black and green goauche, silver paint, graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of University of California, Los Angeles. 1973-15-62.
